{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12686v1", "title": "Rheology of dilute granular gases with hard-core and inverse power-law
  potentials", "summary": "The kinetic theory of dilute granular gases with hard-core and inverse
power-law potentials is developed. The scattering process is studied
theoretically, which yields the relative speed and the impact parameter
dependence of the scattering angle. The viscosity is derived from the Boltzmann
equation and its temperature dependence is plotted. We also perform the direct
simulation Monte Carlo to check the validity of the theory.", "main_category": "cond-mat.soft", "categories": "cond-mat.soft,cond-mat.stat-mech", "published": "2025-04-17T06:26:46Z"}
